BBEX3.M.XAU.DEM.EA.AC.C02: Price of gold in Frankfurt am Main / Frankfurt Stock Exchange fixing / 1 kg of fine gold = DM ... / up to the end of 1998
General: For 1 kilogram gold bars with a fineness of 999.9/1000. First quoted on 18 June 1968.
Methodology: The averages were calculated from daily quotations.
Comment on 1968-06: Average from 18 to 28 June 1968.
